nodes.text: The Coliseum Plaza was a ground-level open area located in Theed, capital city of the planet Naboo. It contained several entertainment venues, namely the Theed Coliseum, the Theed Music Hall and the Naboo Puppet Theater, and also featured a round ornamental pond. Erected on a cliff face and located in the vicinity of a waterfall, the plaza was paved with sandstone-like slabs laid out in a circular pattern. Those who stood on the plaza could get a glimpse of Theed Royal Palace in the distance.
